en.title: Spectacle Frames Testing
en.subTitle: AI’s HOKLAS accredited testing lab offers a wide range of tests for spectacle frames, helping you meet the requirements of your destination market
en.soloutionTitle: Eyewear Expertise – QC for Spectacle Frames
en.soloutionContent:
Despite the abundance of contact lenses and availability of corrective surgery, millions of consumers still choose spectacles as their vision correction device. For many users, spectacles are an important element of personal style, and an accessory they wear for most of their waking time. Quality, safety and robustness requirements for spectacles are high, due to the conditions of their use: prolonged contact with the skin; proximity to the eyes and face; exposure to such aggressive substances as sweat, perfume, and cosmetics.

Under European Directive 2007/47/EC (93/42/EEC), spectacle frames are categorized as a class 1a medical device for vision correction.

AI offers a wide range of performance tests and lab tests for spectacle frames, helping you ensure that your product meets all applicable international standards, as well as the requirements of your destination market. Our two-tier process for quality assurance includes product inspections in the factory and testing in our HOKLAS certified laboratories.

Dedicated Eyewear Testing Labs and Inspector Resources

With our dedicated inspector resources and a HOKLAS accredited testing lab, we offer the largest available range of tests for spectacle frames against all applicable international and national standards, including:

  • International: ISO 12870
  • Europe: EN ISO 12870
  • USA: ANSI Z80.3
  • China: GB/T 14214
  • Australia / New Zealand: AS/NZS ISO 12870

AI’s laboratory is certified to test eyewear to the ISO/IEC 17025 standard for Eyewear and Ophthalmic Products, and to issue reports with HOKLAS and ILAC endorsement. Our test reports are recognized by the British Standards Institution and SAI Global for CE Certification (Europe) and Benchmark Product Certification (Australia).

HOKLAS Certified Lab Testing for Spectacle Frames

AI’s dedicated HOKLAS certified testing laboratory offers a wide range of laboratory tests that check numerous chemical and optical characteristics of your spectacle frames.

Our selection of lab tests for spectacle frames includes, among others:

  • Abuse tests on children spectacle frame: small parts / sharp edge / sharp point / deformation test / drop test / tensile test / compression test / impact test (EN71.1)
  • Color stability against UVA/UVB radiation (industry method)
  • Color stability to cosmetic products (industry method)
  • Corrosion test on metal parts, for ANSI Z80.3-2010
  • Cross-cut test (industry method, ISO 2409)
  • Dimensional stability at elevated temperatures, for ISO / EN ISO 12870 and GB/T 14213
  • Flammability test, for AS/NZS 2228.2
  • Frame color / coating flexibility, for GB/T14214-2003
  • Frame size measurement (including rim circumference) using frame tracers and caliper
  • Hinge strength test (industry method)
  • Hinge/flex joint durability test (industry method)
  • Measuring system and tolerance (ISO 8624), for ISO / EN ISO / ANS/NZS 12870
  • Mechanical stability: bridge deformation and lens retention, for ISO / EN ISO 12870 and GB/T 14214
  • Mechanical stability: endurance, for ISO / EN ISO 12870, AS/NZS 2228.2, and GB/T 14214
  • Mechanical strength (bridge), for AS/NZS 2228.2 and ANSI Z80.3
  • Memory frame material tests: bending temples / bending front and twisting bridge made of memory material (industry method)
  • Nickel release on coated metal parts of spectacle frames (ISO/TS 24348 or EN12472+EN16128), for ISO / EN ISO 12870
  • Resistance to ignition, ISO / EN ISO 12870 and GB/T 14214
  • Resistance to optical radiation (frame colorfastness), for ISO / EN ISO 12870
  • Resistance to Perspiration (Artificial Sweat Corrosion), for ISO / EN ISO 12870, AS/NZS 2228.2, and GB/T 14214
  • Resistance to salt spray corrosion, for AS/NZS 2228.2 and ASTM B117
  • Rubbing test on eyeglass case covering material
  • Rubbing test on paint / surface coating (industry method)
  • Spectacle frame former and tolerance (ISO 11380)
  • Spectacle frame screw thread and tolerance (ISO 11381), for ISO / EN ISO 12870
  • Tensile (pulling) test on material strength or frame strength, for GB/T 14214

AI also provides testing services for your in-house methods and specifications – get in touch with us to get an instant quote.

  • Ready-to-wear reading glasses
  • Fashion sunglasses
  • Ski goggles and performance eyeglasses
  • Eye and face protectors

zh.title: 眼镜框架
zh.subTitle: AI亚检荣获 HOKLAS 认证的测试实验室提供一系列针对眼镜框架的测试，帮助您满足目标市场的要求。
zh.soloutionTitle: 眼镜类产品检测专家——眼镜框架的质量检验
zh.soloutionContent:
虽然市面上有大量的隐形眼镜和视力矫正手术，但数百万的消费者仍然选择眼镜作为其视力矫正装置。对于许多消费者而言，眼镜不仅是睡眠以外大多数时间佩戴的配饰之一，同时也是个人品味的一种重要体现。由于眼镜框架自身使用情况所致，例如长时间接触皮肤、靠近眼睛和脸部、暴露于汗水、香水和化妆品等可能造成损坏的物质，因此对镜框的质量、安全和耐用性也有着很高的要求。

根据欧洲指令 2007/47/EC (93/42/EEC)，眼镜框架属于用于视力矫正的 1a 类医疗器材。

AI亚检提供一系列针对眼镜框架的性能测试和实验室测试，帮助确保您的产品满足适用的所有国际标准以及目标市场的要求。我们的双重质保流程为现场产品检测的供应商审核服务，以及荣获 HOKLAS 认证的实验室测试服务。

专业的眼镜类产品测试实验室和检验团队

我们拥有专业的检验员和荣获 HOKLAS 认证的测试实验室，可以根据适用的所有国际和国家标准，提供最广泛的眼镜框架测试服务，包括：

  • 国际：ISO 12870
  • 欧洲：EN ISO 12870

AI亚检实验室可以按照 ISO/IEC 17025 眼镜与眼科产品标准对眼镜类产品进行测试，并签发带 HOKLAS 与国际实验室认证联盟 (ILAC) 认可的报告。英国标准学会、SAI 国际认证集团 CE 认证（欧洲）以及基准产品认证（澳大利亚）均承认我们的测试报告。

HOKLAS 认证的眼镜框架实验室测试

AI亚检旗下荣获 HOKLAS 认证的专业测试实验室可以提供一系列实验室测试，检查眼镜框架产品的各种化学与光学特性。

我们针对眼镜框架的可选实验室测试包括：

  • 儿童眼镜框架的滥用性测试：小零件/锐边/尖点/变形测试/坠落测试/抗拉测试/抗压测试/冲击测试 (EN71.1)
  • 抗 UVA/UVB 辐射颜色稳定性（行业方法）
  • 对化妆品的颜色稳定性（行业方法）
  • 金属部件防腐蚀测试，标准：ANSI Z80.5-2010
  • 划格测试（行业方法，ISO 2409）
  • 高温下的尺寸稳定性，标准：ISO / EN ISO 12870 和 GB/T 14213
  • 阻燃性测试，标准：AS/NZS 2228.2
  • 镜框颜色/涂层韧性，标准：GB/T14214-2003
  • 使用镜框描图工具和卡尺测量镜框尺寸（含边缘周长）
  • 铰链强度测试（行业方法）
  • 铰链/挠性接头耐久性测试（行业方法）
  • 测量系统和耐受性 (ISO 8624)，标准：ISO / EN ISO / ANS/NZS 12870
  • 机械稳定性：中梁变形和镜片保持力，标准：ISO / EN ISO 12870 和 GB/T 14214
  • 机械稳定性：耐用性，标准：ISO / EN ISO 12870、AS/NZS 2228.2 和 GB/T 14214
  • 机械强度（中梁），标准：AS/NZS 2228.2 和 ANSI Z80.5
  • 记忆镜框材料测试：桩头/框面弯曲，以及由记忆材料制成的弯曲式中梁（行业方法）
  • 眼镜框架涂层金属部件的镍释出量（ISO/TS 24348 或 EN12472+EN16128），标准：ISO / EN ISO 12870
  • 抗燃烧，ISO / EN ISO 12870 和 GB/T 14214
  • 抗光辐射（镜框色牢度），标准：ISO / EN ISO 12870
  • 抗汗能力（人工汗液腐蚀），标准：ISO / EN ISO 12870、AS/NZS 2228.2 和 GB/T 14214
  • 抗盐雾腐蚀，标准：AS/NZS 2228.2 和 ASTM B117
  • 镜盒包覆材料抗摩擦测试
  • 涂料/表面涂层抗摩擦测试（行业方法）
  • 眼镜框架模型和公差 (ISO 11380)
  • 眼镜框架螺纹和公差 (ISO 11381)，标准：ISO / EN ISO 12870
  • 材料强度或框架强度抗拉（拉伸）测试，标准：GB/T 14214

AI亚检也可以根据您的要求提供客制化测试服务，联系我们，立即获取方案及报价。


以下是我们为其他眼镜类产品提供的质量检测服务与实验室测试项目：
  • 光学镜片
  • 成品老花镜
  • 时尚太阳镜
  • 滑雪护目镜和特种眼镜
  • 护目镜和防护面罩
